title: Interaction Share Event Data
description: Data payload for the interaction.share event. Fired when a user shares content via a social or sharing mechanism.

method.description: The sharing method or platform, e.g. facebook, twitter, email, copy_link.

contentType.description: The type of content being shared, e.g. page, product, article.

contentId.description: The unique identifier of the content being shared.

contentUrl.description: The URL of the content being shared.
